moduleMetadataJson.name: MMS Client
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module sends an MMS message to multiple phones of the same carrier.
        You can use it to send a malicious attachment to phones.
author: sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SMTPADDRESS
options.description: The SMTP server to use to send the text messages

options.name: SMTPPORT
options.description: The SMTP port to use to send the text messages

options.name: SMTPUSERNAME
options.description: The SMTP account to use to send the text messages

options.name: SMTPPASSWORD
options.description: The SMTP password to use to send the text messages

options.name: MMSCARRIER
options.description: The targeted MMS service provider (Accepted: att, sprint, tmobile, verizon, google)

options.name: CELLNUMBERS
options.description: The phone numbers to send to

options.name: MMSFILE
options.description: The attachment to include in the text file

options.name: SmtpLoginType
options.description: The SMTP login type (Accepted: plain, login, cram_md5)

options.name: HeloDdomain
options.description: The domain to use for HELO
